intro: World(s)-Designer, W&G-Anwalt, a s(overeign) H(uman), keine Person

post.body:
Today we have: Thursday, November 25, 2021

What's coming is DEnglish ...

My Steckbrief (one goal of Zeronet was, to change the worlds of human kinds. With avatars and a totally anonymity kann dieses Ziel nie erreicht werden):
a.) Jahrgang 1958,
b.) 'Name': noldi the 1st: ein denkender Freigeist; a sovereign Human; not a Person,
c.) Berufung: World(s)-Design, W&G-Anwalt,
d.) Living in: Gecko-Island Nr.: 1 (my own MicroState); Lat.: 48.577220N; Lng.: 08.780168E. Part of The MicroStates of Free EarthCitizen.
Question: Niemand da draussen, willingly to join #thebaaank in the project #lets-build-a-better-world?

Summarizing: Das einzige Ziel ist, building a better World - from scratch. ‘thebaaank’ will reward every sovereign human - von der Wiege bis zur Bahre, let’s say for 100 years, engaging in this project - with 10 millions ecoPounds (e#).

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/

Carpe Diem ...

Building a better World ...

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/

If so, let's start the rumble - invitation: Let's build a better World ...
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/
I think, I have a good 'medicine' for You. Invitation - Let's build a better World!? ...

For spekulant1: gold
For speculant2: bitcoin
For speculantx: pp.
For 'a better World': e# (ecoPound)
Try: Harry Browne / How I Found Freedom in an Unfree World.pdf

Your comment: 'Auf Koks bin ich yu nix yu gebrauchen >/D'
Should it mean: '... zu nix zu gebrauchen ...' . This my be true, but only for a fraction of Your daytime. In the other fraction of Your daytime, You   are doing mind lead decisions. It seems, the wrong decisions. May I try, to help?

@saeedp89: What kind of a developer?

@hermetris: Ein Mensch, can never be 'eine Person'. Ein Mensch, can only be: an employee, a CEO, an administrator, a trustee, pp. of a 'person', aka company, organisation pp. I am ein Mensch, not a person ... What is 'hermetris'? What is Hermes Trismegistos II? What is TRISMEGISTOS II HERMES? What a name, has the human behind this artificials?
